summary.span: 显示树结构中的分层数据，如目录。

span.span: Displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents, in a tree structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [NodesNodes](#nodes) - [静态数据Static Data](#static_data) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population](#dynamic_node_population) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [滚动Scrolling](#scrolling) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录或文件目录，并支持以下功能：The control is used to display hierarchical data, such as a table of contents or file directory, in a tree structure and supports the following features: - 允许控件的节点绑定到 XML、表格或关系数据的数据绑定。Data binding that allows the nodes of the control to be bound to XML, tabular, or relational data. - 通过与 控件集成进行站点导航。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 可以显示为纯文本或超链接的节点文本。Node text that can be displayed as either plain text or hyperlinks. - 以编程方式访问 对象模型，以动态方式创建树、填充节点、设置属性等。Programmatic access to the object model to create trees, populate nodes, set properties, and so on dynamically. - 客户端节点填充（在支持的浏览器上）。Client-side node population (on supported browsers). - 能够在每个节点旁边显示复选框。The ability to display a check box next to each node. - 通过主题、用户定义图像和样式自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, and styles. > [!NOTE] > 仅当 设置为 `true`时，才将 控件设计为在 控件内使用。The control is designed to be used inside an control only when is set to `true`. 控件用于更新页面的选定区域，而不是使用回发来更新整个页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100))和[部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). ## NodesNodes 控件由节点组成。The control is made up of nodes. 树中的每个条目称为一个节点，由一个 对象表示。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 节点类型定义如下：Node types are defined as follows: - 包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. - 其他节点包含的节点称为*子节点*。The node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. - 没有子项的节点称为*叶节点*。A node that has no children is called a *leaf node*. - 不是由任何其他节点包含的节点，而是其他所有*节点的上级节点。*The node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 节点可以是父节点和子节点，但根节点、父节点和叶节点都是互斥的。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 节点的多个视觉和行为属性由节点是根节点、子节点还是叶节点确定。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a root, child, or leaf node. 尽管典型树结构只有一个根节点，但 控件允许您将多个根节点添加到树结构。Although a typical tree structure has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 如果希望在不显示单个根节点的情况下显示项列表，则这非常有用，如在产品类别列表中。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single root node, as in a list of product categories. 每个节点都有一个 属性和一个 属性。Each node has a property and a property. 属性的值将显示在 中，而 属性用于存储关于节点的任何其他数据，如传递到与节点相关联的回发事件的数据。The value of the property is displayed in the , while the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data that is passed to the postback event that is associated with the node. 节点可以是以下两种模式之一：选择模式和导航模式。A node can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要使节点进入导航模式，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串（""）以外的值。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要将某个节点置于选择模式下，请将该节点的 属性设置为空字符串（""）。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to an empty string (""). > [!NOTE] > 某些 Internet 浏览器有可能影响 控件性能的限制。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 的 URL 字符限制为2067个字符。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果节点 URL 中的字符数大于该数量，则展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. ## 静态数据Static Data 控件的最简单数据模型是静态数据。The simplest data model of the control is static data. 若要使用声明性语法显示静态数据，请先在 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套开始和结束 `` 标记。To display static data using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，通过在开始和结束 `` 标记之间嵌套 `` 元素来创建树结构。Next, create the tree structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每个 `` 元素都表示树中的一个节点，并映射到 对象。Each `` element represents a node in the tree and maps to a object. 你可以设置每个节点的属性，方法是设置其 `` 元素的特性。You can set the properties of each node by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要创建子节点，请在父节点的开始和结束 `` 标记之间嵌套其他 `` 元素。To create child nodes, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent node. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件还可以绑定到数据。The control can also be bound to data. 您可以使用两种方法中的任意一种将 控件绑定到相应的数据源类型：You can use either of two methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 控件可以使用实现 接口的任何数据源控件，如 控件或 控件。The control can use any data source control that implements the interface, such as an control or a control. 若要绑定到数据源控件，请将 控件的 属性设置为数据源控件的 值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 控件还可以绑定到 对象或包含关系的 对象。The control can also be bound to an object or a object with relations. 若要绑定到其中一个数据源，请将 控件的 属性设置为数据源，然后调用 方法。To bind to one of these data sources, set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 绑定到数据源（其中每个数据项都包含多个属性）时，默认情况下，节点将显示数据项的 `ToString` 方法返回的值。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点将显示元素名称，该名称显示树的基础结构，但在其他情况下不起作用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过使用 集合指定树节点绑定，将节点绑定到特定数据项属性。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings using the collection. 集合包含 `TreeNodeBinding` 对象，这些对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The collection contains `TreeNodeBinding` objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 您可以指定要在节点中显示的绑定条件和数据项属性。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 有关树节点绑定的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on tree node bindings, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建回调请求并获取页面开发人员未显示的 控件节点的数据。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，数据的安全必须由数据源实现。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用 属性隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. ## 动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population 有时，静态定义树结构是不切实际的，因为数据源返回太多数据，或是因为要显示的数据取决于您在运行时获取的信息。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically define the tree structure because the data source returns too much data or because the data to display depends on information that you get at run time. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，该节点将在展开节点时在运行时填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，必须定义一个事件处理方法，其中包含用于填充 事件的节点的逻辑。To populate a node dynamically, you must define an event-handling method that contains the logic to populate a node for the event. 支持回调脚本的浏览器还可利用客户端节点填充。Browsers that support callback scripts can also take advantage of client-side node population. （这包括 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本以及其他一些浏览器。）客户端节点填充使 控件可以在用户展开节点时使用客户端脚本填充节点，而无需往返服务器。(This includes Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and some other browsers.) Client-side node population enables the control to populate a node using client script when users expand the node, without requiring a round trip to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 可以通过多种方式自定义 控件的外观。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，您可以为每个节点类型指定不同的样式（如字体大小和颜色）。First, you can specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the node types. 如果使用级联样式表（CSS）来自定义控件的外观，则可以使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不能同时使用两者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 同时使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 有关将样式表用于控件的详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出了可用的节点样式。The following table lists the available node styles. |节点样式属性Node style property|说明Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针位于节点上时该节点的样式设置。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||叶节点的样式设置。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||节点的默认样式设置。The default style settings for a node.| ||父节点的样式设置。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根节点的样式设置。The style settings for the root node.| ||所选节点的样式设置。The style settings for a selected node.| 还可以通过使用 集合来控制树中特定深度的节点的样式。You can also control the style of nodes at specific depths within the tree by using the collection. 集合中的第一种样式对应于树中第一级节点的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the first level in the tree. 集合中的第二个样式与树中第二级节点上的节点样式相对应，依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the second level in the tree, and so on. 这通常用于生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中，特定深度的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否具有子节点。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 集合为某个深度级别定义了样式，则该样式会重写该深度节点的任何根节点、父节点或叶节点样式设置。If a style is defined for a certain depth level using the collection, that style overrides any root, parent, or leaf node style settings for the nodes at that depth. 更改控件外观的另一种方法是自定义显示在 控件中的图像。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images that are displayed in the control. 您可以通过设置下表中显示的属性，为控件的不同部分指定您自己的自定义图像集。You can specify your own custom set of images for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |Image 属性Image property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||可折叠节点的指示符所显示图像的 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the collapsible node indicator. 此图像通常为减号（-）。This image is usually a minus sign (-).| ||可展开节点的指示符所显示图像的 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the expandable node indicator. 此图像通常为加号（+）。This image is usually a plus sign (+).| ||包含用于将父节点连接到子节点的线条图像的文件夹的 URL。The URL to the folder containing the line images used to connect parent nodes to child nodes. 属性还必须设置为 `true`，此属性才有效果。The property must also be set to `true` for this property to have an effect.| ||为不可展开节点指示符显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the non-expandable node indicator.| > [!NOTE] > 不需要自定义每个图像属性。You do not need to customize every image property. 如果未显式设置 image 属性，则使用内置的默认映像。If an image property is not explicitly set, the built-in default image is used. 控件还允许您在节点旁显示复选框。The control also allows you to display a check box next to a node. 如果 属性设置为 `TreeNodeTypes.None`以外的值，则复选框将显示在指定节点类型的旁边。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeTypes.None`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node types. > [!NOTE] > 属性可以设置为 枚举成员值的按位组合。The property can be set to a bitwise combination of the enumeration member values. 页面每次发送到服务器时，将自动填充所选节点的 集合。Each time the page is posted to the server, the collection is automatically populated with the selected nodes. 显示复选框时，可以使用 事件来运行自定义例程，只要复选框的状态在发布到服务器之间发生更改。When check boxes are displayed, you can use the event to run a custom routine whenever the state of a check box changes between posts to the server. ## 事件Events 控件提供了多个可对其进行编程的事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了 控件支持的事件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||当 控件的复选框在向服务器的各次发送之间更改状态时发生。Occurs when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server.| ||在 控件中选定某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is selected in the control.| ||在 控件中展开某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.| ||在 控件中折叠某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is collapsed in the control.| ||当其 属性设置为 `true` 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。Occurs when a node with its property set to `true` is expanded in the control.| ||将数据项绑定到 控件中的某个节点时发生。Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the control.| ## 滚动Scrolling 控件没有内置滚动。The control does not have built-in scrolling. 若要添加滚动，请将 控件置于 控件中，并向 控件添加滚动条。To add scrolling, place the control in a control and add scrollbars to the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[面板 Web 服务器控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b)。For more information, see [Panel Web Server Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                 ``` ## Examples 本部分包含七个代码示例：This section contains seven code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何为第二个代码示例设置帧。The first code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the second code example. - 第二个代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法在 控件中显示静态数据。The second code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. - 第三个代码示例演示如何将 控件绑定到 XML 数据源。The third code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. - 第四个代码示例提供了第三个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The fourth code example provides sample XML data for the third code example. - 第五个代码示例演示如何通过将 控件绑定到 控件来进行站点导航。The fifth code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. - 第六个代码示例提供了第五个代码示例的示例站点地图数据。The sixth code example provides sample site map data for the fifth code example. - 第七个代码示例演示如何从客户端填充 控件中的节点。The seventh code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 下面的代码示例演示如何为以下代码示例设置帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法在 控件中显示静态数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. 此示例在前面示例的帧集中用于显示目录。This example is used within the frame set of the preceding example to display a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件绑定到 XML 数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```
``` 下面的代码示例演示如何通过将 控件绑定到 控件来进行站点导航。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. 若要使此示例正常工作，您必须将示例站点地图数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 "web.sitemap" 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding code example. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何从客户端填充 控件中的节点。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 启用客户端节点填充后，节点会在客户端上动态填充，而无需回发到服务器。When client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否自动生成树节点绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control automatically generates tree node bindings.

value.span: 若要让 控件自动生成树节点绑定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to have the control automatically generate tree node bindings; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 树节点绑定定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。Tree node bindings define the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to. 绑定到数据源（其中每个数据项都包含多个属性，如具有多个属性的 XML 元素）时， 控件需要知道要绑定到哪些 属性的数据项属性。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), the control needs to know which data item property to bind to which property. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 控件会自动生成默认树节点绑定，该绑定将与绑定关联的 对象的 属性设置为与该数据项的 `ToString` 方法返回的值。If the property is set to `true`, the control automatically generates default tree node bindings that set the property of the object that is associated with the binding to the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item. > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的树节点绑定不会添加到 集合中。The automatically generated tree node bindings are not added to the collection. 对于 XML 元素，`ToString` 方法返回的值是元素名称，该名称显示 XML 文件的基础结构，但在其他情况下并不十分有用。In the case of an XML element, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method is the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the XML file, but is not very useful otherwise. 若要创建更有用的树，必须通过填充 集合来定义自己的树节点绑定。To create a more useful tree, you must define your own tree node bindings by populating the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果定义 集合，则 控件将使用这些值，而不是自动生成的树节点绑定。If you define a collection, the control uses those values instead of automatically generated tree node bindings. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用自动树节点绑定生成。The first code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例站点地图数据。The second code example provides sample site map data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用自动树节点绑定生成。The following code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 然后定义 集合，以在 控件中的数据项与 控件的节点之间建立关系。A collection is then defined to establish the relationship between the data items in a control and the nodes of the control. 若要使此示例正常工作，您必须将示例站点地图数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 "web.sitemap" 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding example. ``` ```

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 中显示的选中了复选框的节点。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 控件中显示复选框时（通过将 属性设置为除 `TreeNodeType.None`之外的其他值），请使用 属性来确定哪些节点显示选中的复选框。When check boxes are displayed in the control (by setting the property to a value other than `TreeNodeType.None`), use the property to determine which nodes display a selected check box. 此集合通常用于循环访问树中选中了复选框的所有节点。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the nodes that have a selected check box in the tree. 当 控件的复选框在向服务器的各次发送过程间更改状态时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如更新数据库或显示的内容。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 使用树结构的深度优先遍历来填充 集合：在填充下一个父节点之前，每个父节点都向下处理到其子节点。The collection is populated using a depth-first traversal of the tree structure: each parent node is processed down to its child nodes before the next parent node is populated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定 控件中哪些节点具有选定的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which nodes have a selected check box in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置自定义图像的 URL，该图像用作可折叠节点的指示符。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.

value.span: 为可折叠节点所显示的自定义图像的 URL。

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认的减号 (-) 图像。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default minus sign (-) image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为可折叠节点的指示符指定自定义图像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 此图像显示在可以折叠的节点旁边，通常为减号（-）。This image is displayed next to a collapsible node and is usually a minus sign (-). 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件将在节点旁显示加号（+）或减号（-）或占位符图像，以指示节点是可展开、可折叠还是不可展开。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or a minus sign(-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定自定义映像，方法是先将 属性设置为 `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后将 ""、"" 和 "" 属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果未指定任何图像，则使用默认图像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保在使用自定义图像时节点在 控件中正确对齐，请确保 、和 属性指定的所有图像具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 使用自定义图像作为可折叠节点的指示符时，还应考虑设置 属性以指定图像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the collapsible node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为可折叠节点的指示符指定自定义图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 要使代码示例显示和图像显示在控件中，必须提供自己的图像，且 属性必须设置为 `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/CS/treeviewcustomimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/VB/treeviewcustomimagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象定义数据项与其绑定到的节点之间的关系。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

value.span: 表示数据项与其绑定到的节点之间关系的一个 。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 集合包含 对象，这些对象定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 绑定到数据源（其中每个数据项都包含多个属性）时，默认情况下，节点将显示数据项的 `ToString` 方法返回的值。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点将显示元素名称，该名称显示树的基础结构，但在其他情况下不起作用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 可以通过指定树节点绑定将节点绑定到特定数据项属性。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings. 定义数据项与节点之间的关系时，必须同时指定绑定条件和要绑定到 对象属性的值。When defining the relationship between a data item and a node, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the values to bind to the properties of object. 条件指示数据项应绑定到节点的时间。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a node. 可以通过节点深度、数据成员或同时指定这两者。The criteria can be specified with a node depth, a data member, or both. 节点深度指定要绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，如果将节点深度指定为0，则将使用树节点绑定来绑定树结构中处于级别0的所有节点。For example, if you specify a node depth of 0, all nodes in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the tree node binding. 数据成员指定基础数据源中数据项的类型，但可以根据数据源表示不同的信息。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果定义了多个 对象相互冲突，则 控件会按以下优先级顺序应用树节点绑定：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义深度和数据成员的 对象。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 仅定义深度的 对象。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 仅定义数据成员的 对象。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 不定义深度和数据成员的 对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 如果指定了多个符合相同优先级条件的绑定，则会应用集合中的第一个绑定。If multiple bindings are specified that meet the same precedence criteria, the first binding in the collection is applied. 建立绑定条件后，可以绑定可以绑定到值的 对象的属性。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 可以绑定到数据项的属性或字段或显示静态值。You can either bind to an attribute or field of a data item or display a static value. 有关将 对象的属性绑定到值的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 尽管可以通过编程方式填充 集合，但通常以声明方式进行设置。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定树节点绑定，请先在 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套开始和结束 `` 标记。To specify the tree node bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，在要指定的每个树节点绑定的开始和结束 `` 标记之间放置 `` 元素。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each tree node binding you want to specify. 通过将 控件的 属性设置为 `true`来创建数据绑定时，所创建的绑定的 属性设置为 `true`。When data bindings are created by setting the property of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以声明方式创建的数据绑定将 属性设置为 `false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用声明性语法允许您控制单个数据绑定的行为。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 集合来定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The first code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合来定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 此示例仅指定绑定的 属性。This example specifies only the property of the binding. 还可以通过指定 属性来添加略微提高性能。A slight performance gain could be added by also specifying the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性指定 控件是否在兼容的浏览器上呈现客户端脚本来处理展开和折叠事件。Use the property to specify whether the control renders client-side script on compatible browsers to handle expanding and collapsing events. 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则兼容的浏览器将执行代码来展开和折叠客户端上的节点。When this property is set to `true`, compatible browsers execute the code to expand and collapse nodes on the client. 若要运行客户端脚本，必须提前知道树节点数据。The tree node data must be known in advance for the client-side script to work. 使用客户端脚本可防止每次展开或折叠节点时都回发到服务器。Using client script prevents a post back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 如果事先不知道树节点数据，则可以从客户端填充节点（如果 `PopulateNodesFromClient` 属性还设置为 `true`。When the tree node data is not known in advance, nodes can be populated from the client, if the `PopulateNodesFromClient` property is also set to `true`. 在这种情况下，你还必须为 事件提供事件处理方法来填充节点。In this scenario, you must also provide an event-handling method for the event to populate the nodes. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则在每次展开或折叠某个节点时， 控件都将回发到服务器。If the property is set to `false`, the control posts back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性呈现客户端脚本，该脚本用于在兼容的浏览器上展开和折叠节点。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性呈现客户端脚本，该脚本用于在兼容的浏览器上展开和折叠节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 请注意，当 属性设置为 `false`时，需要向服务器发送一条展开和折叠节点的请求。Notice that a post to the server is required to expand and collapse a node when the property is set to `false`. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/CS/treeviewenableclientscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/VB/treeviewenableclientscriptvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为可展开节点的指示符指定自定义图像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 此图像显示在可扩展节点旁边，通常为加号（+）。This image is displayed next to an expandable node and is usually a plus sign (+). 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件将在节点旁显示加号（+）或减号（-）或占位符图像，以指示节点是可展开、可折叠还是不可展开。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定自定义映像，方法是先将 属性设置为 `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后将 ""、"" 和 "" 属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果未指定任何图像，则使用默认图像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保在使用自定义图像时节点在 控件中正确对齐，请确保 、和 属性指定的所有图像具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 若要正确显示自定义图像，可能需要将 设置为 `false`。To display a custom image correctly, you may need to set to `false`. 使用自定义图像作为可展开节点的指示符时，还应考虑设置 属性以指定图像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the expandable node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为可展开节点的指示符指定自定义图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 要使代码示例显示和图像显示在控件中，必须提供自己的图像，且 属性必须设置为 `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于节点上时，使用 属性控制该节点的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 可以在 `Property-Subproperty`格式设置属性，其中 `Subproperty` 是 对象（例如 `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`）的一个属性。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以通过编程方式设置属性，`Property.Subproperty` （例如，`HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`）。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 仅支持脚本的客户端支持此功能。This feature is supported only on script-capable clients. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用 属性，必须包含具有 `runat="server"` 属性的 `` 元素。To use the property, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 样式属性的应用顺序如下：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. 列中的一个值匹配。. > [!NOTE] > 属性的样式设置将覆盖 、、、或 属性中的任何相应的节点样式设置。The style settings for the property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the , , , , or property. 对于其 属性设置为 `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`的节点，不会呈现 属性。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 与 和 属性（它们是 对象）不同， 属性是 对象。Unlike the and the properties, which are objects, the property is a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制在鼠标指针位于节点上时该节点的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 要使此示例正常运行，必须包含具有 `runat="server"` 属性的 `` 元素。For this example to work, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要用于 控件的图像组。Use the property to specify the group of images to use for the control. 你可以选择一组预定义的映像，以使该控件具有标准外观，或定义你自己的自定义集。You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set. > [!NOTE] > 属性不影响节点的任何样式设置。The property does not affect any style settings for a node. 如果要添加自定义颜色和间距，请设置相应的样式属性，如 属性。Set the appropriate style property, such as the property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing. 下表列出了 属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for The property. |映像集Image set|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|使用箭头图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|使用菱形项目符号图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|使用正方形形项目符号图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|预定义的、分节的菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|预定义的、大小随级别不同而变化的、分节的备用菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|使用 MSN Messenger 映像的预定义映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|用户定义的图像集。A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|使用事件日志样式的图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|使用 FAQ 样式的图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|使用电子邮件样式的图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses email-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|使用新闻组样式的图像的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|使用简单形状轮廓的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|使用简单填充形状的预定义图像集。A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|使用 MSDN 映像的预定义映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|使用 Microsoft Windows 帮助图像的预定义映像集。A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|使用在 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 资源管理器映像的预定义映像集。A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| 定义一组自定义图像时，应该为下表中的每个属性指定一个映像。When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table. 否则，将使用该属性的默认图像。Otherwise, the default image for that property is used. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||可折叠节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.| ||可展开节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.| ||包含连接节点的线条的自定义图像的文件夹的 URL。The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| ||不可展开节点指示符的自定义图像的 URL。The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性显示 控件中的 Windows 资源管理器图像集。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 控件中叶节点的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在 `Property-Subproperty`格式设置属性，其中 `Subproperty` 是 对象（例如 `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`）的一个属性。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以通过编程方式设置属性，`Property.Subproperty` （例如，`LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`）。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 样式属性按以下优先级顺序应用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. 列中的一个值匹配。. 如果需要生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，无论它们是否具有子节点，都可以考虑使用 属性，而不是设置各个样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制 控件中的叶节点的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合作为各个样式属性（如 属性）的替代项，以控制树的各个级别上的节点样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree. 集合中的第一种样式对应于树的第一个级别中的节点样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于树第二级的节点样式，依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on. 此属性最常用于生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中某个级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否具有子节点。This property is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. 样式属性的应用顺序如下：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性创建导航菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a navigation menu. 控件始终完全展开，并隐藏展开节点指示符和图像。The control is always fully expanded, with the expansion node indicators and images hidden. 此外， 属性用于控制节点级别的间距。Also, the property is used to control the spacing of the node levels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件可以显示将子节点连接到父节点的行。The control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the property is set to `true`. 显示行时，请使用 属性指定一个 Web 可访问的文件夹，其中包含用于线条的一组预呈现图像。When lines are displayed, use the property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines. 下表描述了 控件使用的图像。The following table describes the images that are used by the control. |映像Image|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gifDash.gif|当树结构中只有一个根节点并且根节点为叶节点时，将在根节点旁边显示一个线条图像。A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gifDashminus.gif|当树结构中只有一个根节点时，显示在根节点旁边的减号（-）图像，以指示扩展根节点。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gifDashplus.gif|当树结构中只有一个根节点时，将在根节点旁显示加号（+）图像，以指示根节点已折叠。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gifI.gif|显示用于连接相邻节点的线条图像。A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gifL.gif|当节点为叶节点时，该节点的最后一个节点旁显示的线条图像。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gifLminus.gif|在分支中的最后一个节点旁显示的线条图像，用于指示该节点已展开。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gifLplus.gif|在分支中的最后一个节点旁显示的线条图像，用于指示该节点处于折叠状态。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gifMinus.gif|显示在包含多个根节点（包含多个根节点以指示节点已展开）的树结构中第一个根节点旁边的减号（-）图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此图像不包含额外的行，并且仅在根节点折叠一次后显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once. 第一次加载页面时，将显示 Rminus 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gifNoexpand.gif|显示在叶节点旁边的空白空白图像。A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node. 此图像允许文本垂直对齐。This image allows text to line up vertically.| |外加 .gifPlus.gif|显示在包含多个根节点的树结构中第一个根节点旁边的加号（+）图像，以指示该节点处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此图像不包含额外的行，并且仅在根节点展开一次后显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once. 第一次加载页面时，将显示 Rplus 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gifR.gif|在包含多个根节点的树结构中的第一个根节点旁显示的线条图像，用于指示该节点是一个叶节点。A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gifRminus.gif|显示在包含多个根节点（包含多个根节点以指示节点已展开）的树结构中第一个根节点旁边的减号（-）图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此图像包含额外的行，并且仅在第一次加载页面时才显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 根节点经过折叠后，将显示减号图像。After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gifRplus.gif|显示在包含多个根节点的树结构中第一个根节点旁边的加号（+）图像，以指示该节点处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此图像包含额外的行，并且仅在第一次加载页面时才显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 根节点展开一次后，将显示该图像的加号。After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gifT.gif|在树结构中间显示的一个线条图像（在 t 交叉处），指示该节点为叶节点。A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gifTminus.gif|在树结构中间显示的节点旁边的减号（-）图像（在 t 交叉处），指示节点已展开。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gifTplus.gif|在树结构中间显示的节点旁边的加号（+）图像（在 t 交叉处），指示节点已折叠。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置 属性，则 控件将使用内置的默认图像（20 x 20 个像素）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 某些可视化设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio）提供了用于生成行图像的工具。Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images. 对于从右到左的显示，运行时间不会反转自定义图像。The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays. 若要同时支持从左到右和从右到左的网页，必须为这两个方向创建图像集。To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定包含要在 控件中显示的行图像的文件夹。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the control. 若要使用此示例，请事先使用线条设计器工具创建一组线条图像。To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images. 将其放在示例应用程序的目录中名为 LineImages 的文件夹中。Place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. remarks.format:
## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性限制要绑定到控件的树级别数。When binding the control to a data source, use the property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control. 例如，将此属性设置为 `2` 仅将根节点和根节点下的任何节点绑定到 控件。For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the control. 数据源中的所有剩余节点均被忽略。All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建回调请求并获取页面开发人员未显示的 控件节点的数据。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，数据的安全必须由数据源实现。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用 属性隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性仅将前两个节点级别（深度0和1）绑定到 控件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性仅将前两个节点级别（深度0和1）绑定到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 数据源中的所有节点级别都将被忽略。All node levels in the data source are ignored. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/CS/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/VB/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取一个 对象，其中包含树中的所有根节点。Use the property to get a object that contains all the root nodes in the tree. 此集合通常用于快速循环访问所有根节点，或访问树中的特定根节点。This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree. > [!NOTE] > 典型树结构只有一个根节点;但是，可以将多个根节点添加到 控件。A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the control. 属性还可用于以编程方式管理树中的根节点。The property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically. 可以添加、插入、删除和检索集合中的 对象。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 在下一次往返服务器后，对集合的任何更新都会自动反映在 控件中。Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the control after the next round trip to the server. 若要访问根节点的子节点，请使用节点的 属性。To access the child nodes of a root node, use the property of the node. 使用每个后续父级别节点的 属性来向下导航节点级别。Use the property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性遍历树。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 控件中节点的默认外观。Use the property to control the default appearance of a node in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在 `Property-Subproperty`格式设置属性，其中 `Subproperty` 是 对象（例如 `NodeStyle-ForeColor`）的一个属性。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以通过编程方式设置属性，`Property.Subproperty` （例如，`NodeStyle.ForeColor`）。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 样式属性按以下优先级顺序应用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. 列中的一个值匹配。. > [!NOTE] > 、或 属性中的相应节点样式设置将覆盖 属性的样式设置。The corresponding node style settings in the , , or properties override the style settings of the property. 如果需要生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，无论它们是否具有子节点，都可以考虑使用 属性，而不是设置各个样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制 控件中节点的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of nodes in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置自定义图像的 URL，该图像用作不可展开节点的指示符。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.

value.span: 为不可展开节点所显示的自定义图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image to display for non-expandable nodes.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认的空白图像。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default blank image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为不可展开的节点指示符指定自定义图像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. "叶节点" （用于替代可展开和可折叠节点的指示符）旁将显示非可展开节点的指示符图像（或空白），以使叶节点与父节点或根节点对齐。The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件将在节点旁显示加号（+）或减号（-）或占位符图像，以指示节点是可展开、可折叠还是不可展开。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以通过先将 属性设置为 `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后将 、和 属性设置为自定义图像的 Url 来指定自定义映像。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果未指定任何图像，则使用默认图像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保在使用自定义图像时节点在 控件中正确对齐，请确保 、和 属性指定的所有图像具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为不可展开节点的指示符指定自定义图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 要使代码示例显示和图像显示在控件中，必须提供自己的图像，且 属性必须设置为 `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/CS/treeviewcustomimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/VB/treeviewcustomimagevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用 方法来引发 事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展 类时使用。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，该节点将在展开节点时在运行时填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，请首先将节点的 属性设置为 `true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，为以编程方式填充节点的 事件定义事件处理方法。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据，将这些数据放入节点结构，然后将节点结构添加到所填充节点的 集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 节点结构是通过向父节点的 集合添加 对象创建的。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式在其下嵌套另一个节点;否则，将在页面上出现错误。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器（Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器和更高版本）也可利用客户端节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 启用后，这允许 控件在节点展开时，动态填充客户端上的节点，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 控件中父节点的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在 `Property-Subproperty`格式设置属性，其中 `Subproperty` 是 对象（例如 `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`）的一个属性。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以通过编程方式设置属性，`Property.Subproperty` （例如，`ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`）。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 样式属性按以下优先级顺序应用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. 列中的一个值匹配。. 如果需要生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，无论它们是否具有子节点，都可以考虑使用 属性，而不是设置各个样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制 控件中父节点的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含分隔符分隔的节点值列表，这些值构成了从根节点到当前节点的路径。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node. 使用 属性指定分隔节点值时所用的分隔符字符。Use the property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values. 此值通常在分析各个值的列表时使用。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values. 根据 控件中显示的文本，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。Depending on the text that is displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果将分隔符字符设置为逗号，则显示的文本不应包含任何逗号;否则，无法准确分析 属性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the property cannot be parsed accurately. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定节点的 属性的分隔符字符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the delimiter character for the property of a node. 然后，使用该值分析各个值的 属性。This value is then used to parse the property for the individual values. span.span: to populate tree node data on demand from the client; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，该节点将在展开节点时在运行时填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 除了按需填充节点以外，还可以直接在受支持的客户端浏览器上填充节点。In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser. 如果将 属性设置为 `true`，则从客户端调用服务以填充树节点，这无需回发到服务器。When the property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server. 否则， 控件将回发到服务器来填充节点。Otherwise, the control posts back to the server to populate the nodes. > [!NOTE] > 若要将 属性设置为 `true`，还必须将 属性设置为 `true`。The property must also be set to `true` in order for the property to be set to `true`. 若要在客户端上填充节点，请首先将 属性设置为 "`true`，然后将该节点的 属性设置为" `true`"。To populate a node on the client, first set the property to `true` and then set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，为以编程方式填充节点的 事件定义事件处理方法。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据，将这些数据放入节点结构，然后将节点结构添加到所填充节点的 集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 您可以通过向父节点的 集合添加 对象来创建节点结构。You create a node structure by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式在其下嵌套另一个节点;否则，将在页面上出现错误。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. > [!NOTE] > 支持回调脚本的浏览器支持客户端节点填充功能。The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts. 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调脚本访问，请使用 类的 属性。To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the property of the class. 可以通过 类的 属性访问当前请求的 类的实例。You can access the instance of the class for the current request through the property of the class. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性启用 控件中节点的客户端填充。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the control. 请注意，启用客户端节点填充后，节点会在客户端上动态填充，而无需回发到服务器。Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该页将 `eventArgument` 参数的值传递给实现 接口的控件的 方法。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method of the control that implements the interface. 此 控件还将呈现导致回发事件发生的 HTML 元素。This control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur. 如果控件呈现要回发到服务器的客户端脚本，则会在 `eventArgument` 参数中传递该脚本的参数。If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回发事件是由简单的服务器提交引起的，则 `eventArgument` 参数 `null`。If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`. 方法为 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件实现的多个事件提供了功能。The method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件中节点的文本可以是以下两种模式之一：选择模式和导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要使节点进入导航模式，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串（""）以外的值。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要将某个节点置于选择模式下，请将该节点的 属性设置为空字符串（""）。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to empty string (""). 当节点处于选择模式时，用户可以通过单击节点中的文本来选择节点。When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node. 使用 属性可确定在 控件中选择了哪个节点。Use the property to determine which node is selected in the control. > [!NOTE] > 控件显示超链接时无法选择节点。A node cannot be selected when the control displays hyperlinks. 显示超链接时， 属性总是返回 `null`。When hyperlinks are displayed, the property always returns `null`. 当用户通过单击新节点中的文本在 控件中选择另一个节点时，默认情况下会引发 事件。When the user selects a different node in the control by clicking the text in the new node, the event is raised, by default. 可以通过设置属性的 属性来指定其他事件。You can specify a different event by setting the property for the property. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||在展开和折叠之间切换节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 适当地引发 或 事件。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 节点只展开，从不折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 对于其 属性设置为 `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`的节点，不会呈现 。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性确定 控件中选定节点的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the selected node in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 控件中选择节点时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a node is selected in the control. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如更新显示的内容。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 您可以选择设置节点的 属性，以指定在选择该节点时引发的事件。You can optionally set the property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||在展开和折叠之间切换节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 适当地引发 或 事件。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 节点只展开，从不折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 对于其 属性设置为 `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`的节点，不会呈现 。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 仅当用户单击节点时在回发时才会触发 事件。The event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node. 如果以编程方式更改 属性，则不会触发事件。The event is not fired if the property is changed programmatically. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在 控件中选择节点时，更新 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a control when a node is selected in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 控件中选定节点的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the selected node in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的 对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在 `Property-Subproperty`格式设置属性，其中 `Subproperty` 是 对象（例如 `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`）的一个属性。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以通过编程方式设置属性，`Property.Subproperty` （例如，`SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`）。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 样式属性按以下优先级顺序应用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 列中的一个值匹配。. 2. 、或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义了 集合，则此时将应用该集合，并重写其他节点样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 列中的一个值匹配。. 4. 列中的一个值匹配。. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性控制 控件中选定节点的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the selected node in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示哪些节点类型将在 控件中显示复选框。

value.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在 控件中提供多节点选择支持，可以在节点的图像旁显示复选框。To provide multi-node selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node. 使用 "" 属性可指定哪些节点类型将显示复选框。Use the property to specify which node types will display a check box. 例如，如果将此属性设置为 `TreeNodeType.Parent`，则将为树中的每个父节点显示复选框。For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree. 下表列出了此属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |节点类型Node type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeType.All`|为所有节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Leaf`|为所有叶节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.None`|不显示复选框。Check boxes are not displayed.| |`TreeNodeType.Parent`|为所有父节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Root`|为所有根节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.| 用于 属性的枚举类型是一个标志枚举，它允许您通过按位运算组合值。The enumeration type that is used for the property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations. 例如，若要显示父节点和叶节点的复选框，请使用按位 "或" 运算符组合 `TreeNodeType.Parent` 和 `TreeNodeType.Leaf` 值。For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values. 若要确定哪些节点选中了复选框，请循环访问 集合的节点。To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置每个节点的 属性来覆盖 设置。You can override the setting by setting the property for each node. 如果只需要提供单项选择支持，请考虑使用 属性。If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示和隐藏不同节点类型的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/CS/treeviewshowcheckboxescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/VB/treeviewshowcheckboxesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 展开节点指示符用于显示节点是展开、折叠还是不可展开。Expansion node indicators are used to show whether a node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. 使用 "" 属性可指定是否在 控件中显示展开节点指示符。Use the property to specify whether the expansion node indicators are displayed in the control. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件将在节点旁显示加号（+）或减号（-）或占位符图像，以指示节点是可展开、可折叠还是不可展开。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以通过先将 属性设置为 `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后将 、和 属性设置为自定义图像的 Url 来指定自定义映像。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果未指定任何图像，则使用默认图像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示和隐藏展开节点图标。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the expansion node icons. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否显示将子节点连接到父节点的行。Use the property to specify whether the lines that are connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed. 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则 控件将搜索由行图像的 属性指定的可通过 Web 访问的文件夹。When this property is set to `true`, the control searches the Web-accessible folder that is specified by the property for the line images. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置 属性，则 控件将使用内置的默认图像（20 x 20 个像素）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性显示 控件中连接节点的线。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display lines connecting nodes in the control. 请确保使用线条设计器工具创建一组线条图像，并将其放置在示例应用程序的目录中名为 LineImages 的文件夹中。Be sure to use the Line Designer tool to create a set of line images and place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它用于为屏幕读取器呈现替换文字以跳过该控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the content for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串， 将其呈现为不可见图像的替换文字，作为对屏幕读取器的提示。

span.span: A string that the renders as alternate text with an invisible image as a hint to screen readers.

value.span: 默认为“跳过导航链接”。

span.span: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个属性，你可以将其设置为使网页更易于访问。The property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible. 包含重复内容的网页可以为屏幕阅读器用户提供一种机制来跳过读取内容的机制。Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud. 控件提供了 属性作为一种方法，让屏幕阅读器跳过整个控件。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果设置了 属性，则会呈现一个带有替换文本的不可见图像，为用户提供跳转到控件末尾的选项。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 屏幕阅读器会大声朗读备用文本，而图像只占用一个像素空间。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space. 若要对页面的呈现进行像素精确的控制，请将 属性设置为空字符串（""），并提供您自己的用于跳过树的机制。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree. 默认情况下， 属性设置为空字符串，这使得屏幕阅读器不会跳过控件。The property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在单击节点时要在其中显示链接到该节点的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性作为 `target` 属性呈现。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许使用 `anchor` 元素的 `target` 属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果 的呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1，则不设置 属性。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). > > 创建可访问的网页时，应避免使用 属性以面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在单击节点时显示链接到新窗口中某个节点的 Web 内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the Web content that is linked to a node in a new window when that node is clicked.
