MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TreeNodeCheckChanged As TreeNodeEventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件中的复选框在向服务器的两次发送过程之间状态有所更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a check box in the control changes state between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件中的复选框在向服务器的各次发送之间更改状态时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a check box in the control changes state between posts to the server. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如更新数据库或显示的内容。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 即使 事件在回发时引发，更改复选框也不会导致回发。Even though the event is fired on post back, changing a check box does not cause a post back. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在 控件的复选框在向服务器发送内容之间更改状态时，更新 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a control when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCheckChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCheckChanged/CS/treeviewcheckchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCheckChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCheckChanged/VB/treeviewcheckchangedvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当数据项绑定到 控件中的节点时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a data item is bound to a node in the control. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 事件在满足某些条件时更改节点的图像。The first code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在满足某些条件时更改节点的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须将示例 XML 数据（在此代码示例之后提供）复制到名为 books.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 此外，请务必提供自己的图像，以便此示例显示。Also be sure to provide your own images for this example to display. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound/CS/treeviewtreenodedataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound/VB/treeviewtreenodedataboundvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TreeNodeExpanded As TreeNodeEventHandler

span.span: Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 控件中展开节点时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a node is expanded in the control. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果将节点的 属性设置为 `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand` 或 `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`，则在 控件中单击该节点时，也会引发 事件。If the property for a node is set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand` or `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`, the event is also raised when that node is clicked in the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了当用户展开 控件中的节点时，如何使用 事件来更新 控件的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the content of a control when the user expands a node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/CS/treeviewtreenodeexpandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/VB/treeviewtreenodeexpandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TreeNodePopulate As TreeNodeEventHandler

summary.span: 当其 属性设置为 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a node with its property set to is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，该节点将在展开节点时在运行时填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，请首先将节点的 属性设置为 `true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，为以编程方式填充节点的 事件定义事件处理方法。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that populates the node programmatically. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据，将这些数据放入节点结构，然后将节点结构添加到所填充节点的 集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 节点结构是通过向父节点的 集合添加 对象创建的。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的 属性设置为 `true`时，必须动态填充节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 不能以声明方式在其下嵌套另一个节点;否则，将在页面上出现错误。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器（Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器和更高版本）也可利用客户端节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 启用后，这允许 控件在展开节点时在客户端上动态填充节点，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件在服务器上动态填充 控件中的节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to populate the nodes in the control dynamically on the server. 请注意， 属性设置为 "`false`" 以防止在客户端上处理展开节点事件。Notice that the property is set to `false` to prevent expanding-node events from being handled on the client. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/CS/treeviewtreenodepopulatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/VB/treeviewtreenodepopulatevb.aspx#1)]
